> I like your page Max (Hope you don't mind my adding a link to our FAQ).

Not at all.

> If you give me a comment on the difference between
> and whats currently in 1.10.1, I'll update whats at
> $HERITRIX_HOME/src/scripts.

:: 2006-09-03  Updated error handling (Max):
::             - Do justice to compulsory --admin switch
::             - Handle missing JMX permissions file (it's not created
::               automatically on Windows as we have nothing like sed)
::             - No double confirmation for fixing permissions
::             - More verbose on errors
:: 2006-09-07  - REALLY fixed the classpath this time


Heritrix 1.10.1 is now working very reliable on a 2003 server with the
setup described in the howto. NutchWAX is next.... this might be harder
:-)

Max
